page.title: 01General Review
page.content: The area is divided north/south by the {King George V Reservoir,}part of the{Lee Valley Regional Park,}and may be characterised by a rural/urban split marked by the line of the reservoir. The western section is predominantly{ an{urban industrial}environment with some residential areas.There is little open space in this area except for a section of Durants Park which extends into the block. The area to the east of the reservoir is,by contrast{rural.Agriculture and {recreation}are the predominant land uses,whilst a section of{Epping Forest extends into the region. Main transport links run north/south following the line of the valley;a single busy east/west link joining the two sections.
